Source.Name: gmusicbrowser
Source.Summary: Music player for large collections of music.
Source.Description: Very customizable music player for large collections of files. Main features - customizable window layouts - artist/album lock easily restrict playlist to current artist/album - easy access to related songs (same artist/album/title) - simple mass-tagging and mass-renaming - support multiple genres for each song - customizable labels can be set for each song - filters with unlimited nesting of conditions - customizable weighted random mode

Package.Name: gmusicbrowser
